abstract: Returns the checking types for the data detector.
overview:
## Discussion

The supported subset of checking types are specified in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType]. Those constants can be combined using the C-bitwise OR operator.

Currently, the supported data detectors `checkingTypes` are:  [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/date], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/address], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/link], `NSTextCheckingTypePhoneNumber`, and `NSTextCheckingTypeTransitInformation`.

# checkingTypes

**Instance Property**

Returns the checking types for the data detector.

## Declaration

```swift
var checkingTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes { get }
```

## Discussion

The supported subset of checking types are specified in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType]. Those constants can be combined using the C-bitwise OR operator.

Currently, the supported data detectors `checkingTypes` are:  [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/date], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/address], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/link], `NSTextCheckingTypePhoneNumber`, and `NSTextCheckingTypeTransitInformation`.
title: checkingTypes
